TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed GestureType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates the type of the current gesture.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype GameStack.GestureType Pan = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A pan gesture, with a single touch point that is being moved in any direction.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype GameStack.GestureType Swipe = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A swipe gesture, the quick movement of a single touch in a horizontal or vertical direction.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype GameStack.GestureType Tap = int32(0)

Docs.summary: A touch that begins and ends without moving significantly.
